DOC.detailed_description: Inpatients DSM IV diagnosis schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder DM II enrol give informed consent . Participants may stay original ward MPC , clinical care would better serve home ward patient program and/or continuity care reason . Patients recruit participate site transfer MPC research ward . There screen phase ( two week ) prior antipsychotic regimen , cross-titration phase ( three week ) ziprasidone phase ( eight week ; four time point ) . All medication , except antipsychotic agent , keep stable throughout protocol . These medication may include anticholinergic , mood stabilizer antidepressant . After screen phase last two week , patient enter cross-titration phase last three week . The cross titration schedule change accordance Deutschman & Deutschman 's 2005 recommendation . The current antipsychotic gradually decrease zero ziprasidone start 40 mg bid po raise 160 mg po bid cross-titration phase , accord clinical response tolerance . After cross-titration phase conclude , ziprasidone dose range 80 mg bid p.o . 160 mg bid p.o . daily accord clinical response eight week treatment phase .
